# DockAccessory.Animation

**Enumeration**

Character animations that describe how to move the dock accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Animation
```

## Overview

Each animation executes on a predefined trajectory. See [doc://com.apple.DockKit/documentation/DockKit/DockAccessory/animate(motion:)] for more information.

## Enumeration Cases

- **DockAccessory.Animation.kapow**: The dock accessory performs a quick tilt and snaps back with some oscillation.
- **DockAccessory.Animation.no**: The dock accessory traces a horizontal head shake.
- **DockAccessory.Animation.wakeup**: The dock accessory moves upwards towards center.
- **DockAccessory.Animation.yes**: The dock accessory traces a vertical head nod.

## Performing animation

- **animate(motion:)**: Starts an animation sequence.
- **setRegionOfInterest(_:)**: Sets the area in the video frame in which the dock accessory tracks a subject.
- **regionOfInterest**: The area in the video frame in which the dock accessory tracks a subject.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
